channel.title: How do you get the npc that changes your gender?
channel.description: I went to falador on moparscape and went to the hairdressers and noticed nobody is there, and some people said you need to type something to get it. I know you do ::pickup itemname quantity for getting items, but what do you do to get NPC characters so you can change your looks/gender?

item.title: How do you get the npc that changes your gender?
item.dc:creator: @baller305 baller305
item.description:
@baller305 wrote:

srry i cant do it cause I CANT DOWNLOAD MOPARSCAPE ANYMORE CAUSE UPPIT DOESNT WANNA WORK :mad:

Read full topic

item.title: How do you get the npc that changes your gender?
item.dc:creator: @baller305 baller305
item.description:
@baller305 wrote:

kk let me tell u a few things bout moparscape
1.u cant wear necklaces as jewllary on amulets
2.dont use seitem its really stupid u cant wear it if u type setitem
3.if u tryin to chane ur look with char u cant accept i think u have to log out and log in again but i dnt think is still gona work
4.to have more fun in moparscape use some1 else’s private server let me give u a few private servers.

in server ip bar type:
playscape.org
kolwebs.org
jewscape.no-ip.org
4everscape.servegame.com
icescape0.no-ip.org
bloodzpk.no-ip.info
n3bulascap3.no-ip.org :)[br][size=1]Posted on: April 28, 2007, 09:35:08 PM[/size][hr]dnt tell me wat to do :mad:

item.source: How do you get the npc that changes your gender?

item.title: How do you get the npc that changes your gender?
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Baller, stop giving stupid suggestions, either post help or don’t.

Well, you could use something like:

else if (NPCID == ID) { } selectoption("What gender do you want to be?", "Male.", "Female.", ""); sexChange = 1; } else if(absX > objectX) { selectoption("What gender do you want to be?", "Male.", "Female.", ""); sexChange = 2; }

And add these right…

[code]else if(sexChange == 1) {
RemoveAllWindows();
sendMessage(“You are now a man.”);
pHead=1;
pBeard=10;
pTorso=18;
pArms=26;
pHands=33;
pLegs=36;
pFeet=42;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
sexChange = -1;
}

else if(sexChange == 2) {
RemoveAllWindows();
sendMessage(“You are now a female.”);
pHead=50;
pTorso=57;
pArms=62;
pHands=68;
pLegs=72;
pFeet=80;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
sexChange = -1;
}*/[/code]

But I won’t tell where.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you get the npc that changes your gender?
item.dc:creator: @x-sez-x x-sez-x
item.description:
@x-sez-x wrote:

Is it that easy o.o !?!
Thanks… I presume this makes that box pop up where you choose your clothes and stuff.
[offtopic-ish] What is annoying is when I try to enchant amulets nothing happens and it froze when I tried removing it so I had to weild something else to remove it and drop it. I don’t see how jewellry counts as a weapon… but its not important at least.

[[Edit: I can’t click accept for some reason! D: Why?]]
